result.title: Wrong answer!!
result.content:
hey guys, I have written a c++ code for round #269 div.2 MUH and sticks. I have tested for various cases in my PC but after submitting I'm getting verdict that test case 1 failed. But when I tested that case on my PC I'm getting right answer. As I am new to codeforces please ignore any silly mistakes.

My code:

==================

#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){

    int* a=new int[6]();

    int* b=new int();


    int max=0;

    for(int  i=0;i<6;i++)
    {

       cin >> a[i];

       if(i>0){
       if(a[i]>a[i-1])
       max=a[i];
         }

    else
    max=a[i];

       b[a[i]]++;

    }

    int count1=0;
    int count2=0;
    int count3=0;


    for(int i=0;i<=max;i++)
    {

       if(b[i]==4 || b[i]==6 || b[i]==5)
       count1++;
       if(b[i]==2 || b[i]==6)
       count2++;
       if(b[i]==1)
       count3++;

    }

    if(count1!=1  || count3==1|| count3==3)
    cout<<"Alien";
    else if(count2==1 )
    cout<<"Elephant";
    else if(count3==2|| count1==1)
    cout<<"Bear";  

    delete[] a;
    delete[] b;
}

Test case : 4 2 5 4 4 4 Expected output: bear Output on my PC: bear Codeforces verdict: alien
